posts.post_title: SOLD******* 1887-89 N172 Old Judge Jake Beckley #25-3 PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Offered is a 1887-89 N172 Old Judge Jake Beckley #25-3 Catch, Hands out neck high.PSA 2 graded. Card is up on ebay for $1229. Many offers and interest on ebay but tired of the “low ball offers on eBay”. Card is yours for $1125 paypal FF.  shipped. 

Pm for scans or offers. Not looking for trade unless you have HOF/star m101-5s

posts.post_title: Get a life and watch your mouth
posts.post_content:
[quote name="SAllen2556" post=1914158]There may be surgery to correct that. Good luck with your sale.  And your balls.[/QUOTE]

Scott,

Get a life and watch your mouth. My balls are just fine, but you clearly you don’t have any or like talking about men’s balls. Either way stop hiding behind a computer and thinking that your funny, because your not. Clearly I meant low ball offers on eBay.

Fwiw, I thought it rather funny and he was just adding a little levity.  Plus you got a bump with his post.  

Rob M.
can't find the card on fleabay.  got a scan?

Rob M.[/QUOTE]

I don’t remember asking for your input. This section of net54 is for buy, sell,trade. Not comments from the peanut gallery. If you think the joke was so funny you should PM Scott and tell jokes back and fourth, but don’t do it on my posts or any post where someone is trying to conduct business. FWIW the post did not need a bump- it was new to the site and sold within 8 hours.
